title: About
text:
I‚Äôm a PhD candidate in Quantitative Biomedical Sciences at Dartmouth (advisor: Michael Whitfield).
Previously, I completed an MS in Computational Biology at CMU and built tools spanning R/Python/Go.

Research focus

Patient stratification from bulk & single-cell omics
GSVA/Pathway modeling for disease mechanisms
Interactive, reproducible analysis with Shiny, Dash, and Streamlit

title: Thoughts
text:
Hello world -
So many thoughts floating in my mind
The self is such a simple but yet complex concept
Can‚Äôt be closer physically sometimes
Can‚Äôt be farther away or more detached in some ways
It‚Äôs a daily exercise to be honest with her
To listen
To accept
To just be
To forgive
So she doesn‚Äôt get lost and scared again
